resources.string:
Welcome to Quiz App!

Please answer the following question related to logical fallacy
Today late for ten minutes, tomorrow late for an hour, and then someday you will simply cease to show up
One declares that a teapot is, at this very moment, in orbit around the Sun between the Earth and Mars, and that because no one can prove him wrong, his claim is therefore a valid one.
What is/are the example of False Dilemma?
\"You either with me or against me\"
\"Iraq is another quagmire, just like Vietnam\"
\"She loves me; she loves me not\"
\"If we legalize gay marriage, next people will want to legalize polygamy\" is/are the example of?
What is the fallacy name of \"Everyone's voting for Jokowi, he is definitely the best president candidate\"
\"We should move to the midwest because the Wall Street Journal says the cost of living is cheaper there\" is fallacy name of Appeal to ...
